ns0:DescribedValueSet.displayName: IV Fluids Required for Grade 3 or Higher Diarrhea

ns0:Concept.displayName: 500 ML Glucose 50 MG/ML / Sodium Chloride 9 MG/ML Injection
1000 ML Glucose 50 MG/ML / Sodium Chloride 9 MG/ML Injection
250 ML Glucose 50 MG/ML / Sodium Chloride 9 MG/ML Injection
Calcium Chloride 0.0014 MEQ/ML / Potassium Chloride 0.004 MEQ/ML / Sodium Chloride 0.103 MEQ/ML / Sodium Lactate 0.028 MEQ/ML Injectable Solution

ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set is intended to capture intravenous fluids which may be administered to patients with grade 3+ diarrhea.),(Data Element Scope: This value set would use the Medication QDM category.),(Inclusion Criteria: For the purposes of this value set, the following IV fluids are included: - NSS - D5W - D5NS - Lactated Ringers),(Exclusion Criteria: IV fluids other than those listed above have been excluded from this value set.)
ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Definition: (2.16.840.1.113883.3.7643.2.1061:IV Fluids Required for Grade 3 or Higher Diarrhea)
